subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: J. P. Dumont scored a goal and had two assists, and the Nashville Predators held off the visiting Edmonton Oilers, 4-3, last night and moved out of a tie with Buffalo and Detroit at the top of the N.H.L.
